item.title: [Emulous] Settings [Emulous]
item.dc:creator: @Skyro Arbe
item.description:
@Skyro wrote:

Hey MoparScape,

I’m adding this custom feature in that saves, all there settings they set in the game options tab. How do I go about adding all these though, I’m really confused

[code=java]
/**
*
* Characters Settings
*
*/

		characterfile.write("[SETTINGS]", 0, 11);
		characterfile.newLine();
		characterfile.write("screen-brightness = ", 0,

19);
characterfile.write(Integer.toString

(p.screenBrightness), 0, Integer
.toString

(p.screenBrightness).length());
characterfile.newLine();
characterfile.write("mouse-buttons = ", 0, 17);
characterfile.write(Integer.toString

(p.mouseButtons), 0,
Integer.toString

(p.mouseButtons).length());
characterfile.newLine();
characterfile.write("chat-effects = ", 0, 17);
characterfile.write(Integer.toString

(p.chatEffects), 0,
Integer.toString

(p.chatEffects).length());
characterfile.newLine();
characterfile.write("split-chat = ", 0, 19);
characterfile.write(Integer.toString

(p.splitChat), 0, Integer
.toString(p.splitChat).length());
characterfile.newLine();
characterfile.write("accept-aid = ", 0, 20);
characterfile.write(Integer.toString

(p.acceptAid), 0,
Integer.toString

(p.acceptAid).length());
characterfile.newLine();
characterfile.write("move-speed = ", 0, 14);
characterfile.write(Integer.toString

(p.moveSpeed), 0, Integer
.toString(p.moveSpeed).length());
characterfile.newLine();
characterfile.newLine();

}[/code]

Also, the numbers. How do I make them correct?
